articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Receives Credentials from Nepalese Ambassador
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Receives Credentials from Nepalese Ambassador
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, received credentials from Nepalese Ambassador to the DPRK Tanka Prasad Karki at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Thursday.
					 After receiving the credentials, Kim had a talk with the ambassador.

articles.title: Mongolian Delegation Here
articles.content:
Mongolian Delegation Here
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Institute of Philosophy, Sociology and Law of the Mongolian Academy of Sciences headed by Chuluunbaatar Gelegpil, director of the institute, arrived here today.

articles.title: DPRK's Stand on All Forms of Terrorism Reiterated
articles.content:
DPRK's Stand on All Forms of Terrorism Reiterated
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- A DPRK delegate clarified the view of his delegation on the anti-terror struggle, addressing the meeting of the 6th Committee of the 63rd UN General Assembly which discussed the agenda item "Measure for combating international terrorism" held on October 8.
					 Underlining the need to pay special attention to eradicating state-sponsored terrorism at an early date, he noted that the U.S. forces' armed invasion of Afghanistan and Iraq and their continued "anti-terrorism war" in those countries are typical examples of terrorism committed by state armed forces.
					
					 He stressed the need for the international community to keep high vigilance against the dangerous terrorism by the state army and conduct all anti-terrorism activities in such a way as to serve the purpose and principle of the UN Charter and respect international law under any circumstances, centering around the UN.
					
					 He also emphasized the need not to allow some specified states to use the anti-terrorism struggle as leverage for seeking their political and economic purposes in any case.
					
					 In order to remove the root cause of terrorism it is necessary to direct primary efforts to eradicating the social inequality and poverty while establishing the fair international relations of mutual respect, equality, friendship and cooperation whereby all countries and nations can fully exercise their rights to live and develop independently, he said, and went on:
					
					 The DPRK government has consistently maintained the firm stand of opposing all forms of terrorism and support of any form to them and will fulfill its responsibility and duty as a member state of the UN to eradicate the root cause of all forms of terrorism and build a peaceful, stable and prosperous world, guided by the idea of its foreign policy of independence, peace and friendship in the future, too.

articles.title: Publication of 20,000th Issue of Minju Joson Marked
articles.content:
Publication of 20,000th Issue of Minju Joson Marked
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- A meeting to mark the publication of the 20,000th issue of Minju Joson was held Wednesday.
					 Minju Joson was founded and its inaugural issue published on June 4, Juche 35 (1946).
					
					 Present at the meeting were Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, the staff and employees of the newspaper.
					
					 Kim Jong Suk, editor-in-chief of the newspaper, in her report made at the meeting said that General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "The Democratic People's Republic of Korea Is a Socialist State of Juche with Invincible Might" glorifies the more than six decade-long history of Minju Joson, organ of the DPRK government, and encourages all its officials, journalists and editors in their efforts to perform fresh feats.  
					
					 The course of publishing 20,000 issues of the newspaper is associated with the warm care shown by the peerlessly great persons who founded the Juche-based idea of media, always attaching importance to a writing brush as well as to arms in the revolution and construction, and worked heart and soul for the development of the revolutionary media, the reporter noted, and went on:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung clarified theoretical and practical issues ranging from the character, mission and basic duty of the newspaper to the principle to govern the journalists' activities and its edition and publication, leading it with warm care to preserve its status as the organ of the government and serve as a powerful ideological weapon.
					
					 Anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk, true to the noble intention of the President, paid deep attention to its foundation and publication and took care of the newspaper so that it might creditably fulfill its mission and role.
					
					 Kim Jong Il has energetically led the newspaper to add shine to the tradition established by the President and his exploits performed in building the organ of the government.
					
					 The reporter stressed that the newspaper would increase its militant function and role and thus actively contribute to the building of a great prosperous powerful socialist nation.

articles.title: Joint Friendly Gathering Held
articles.content:
Joint Friendly Gathering Held
Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- A joint friendly gathering took place at the Rungrado Recreation Ground Thursday under the co-sponsorship of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, the Russian embassy here and the DPRK-Russia Friendship Association on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic ties between the DPRK and Russia. 
					 Attending the gathering were Acting Chairman of the committee Mun Jae Chol, Vice-Chairperson of the committee Hong Son Ok who is chairperson of the association, officials concerned, Russian Ambassador to the DPRK Valery Sukhinin and staff members of his embassy. 
					
					 There was first an art performance given by the State National Art Troupe.
					
					 Put on the stage were dance "Yangsando", female solo "We Are Always Confident," mixed duet "Arirang for Prosperity" and Russian songs including "Katsusha" and "Valenki." 
					
					 Staff members of the Russian embassy sang songs prepared by themselves. 
					
					 Then it was followed by colorful sports and amusement games.

articles.title: Lao Embassy Officials Help Korean Farmers
articles.content:
Lao Embassy Officials Help Korean Farmers
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- Chaleune Warinthrasak, Lao ambassador to the DPRK, and staff members of his embassy visited the DPRK-Laos Friendship Taewon Cooperative Farm in Sadong District, Pyongyang, Thursday where they gave helping hands to its members in harvesting. 
					 They helped farmers in carrying rice sheaves. 
					
					 During break, they sang songs and talked with farmers. 
					
					 The ambassador said that the friendship between the two countries provided by President Kim Il Sung and President Kaysone Phomvihane would last forever. 
					
					 He expressed belief that the Korean people would achieve greater successes in the struggle to build a great prosperous powerful socialist nation and reunify the country, true to the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 The guests handed aid materials to the farm.

articles.title: "Complete Book on Kimilsungia" and "Complete Book on Kimjongilia " Off Press
articles.content:
"Complete Book on Kimilsungia" and "Complete Book on Kimjongilia" Off Press
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- "Complete Book on Kimilsungia" and "Complete Book on Kimjongilia" were published by a compilation committee grouping holders of academic degrees and titles in the horticultural field of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea. 
					 The above-said books explain how the flowers of the sun came into full blossom as the most famous ones in the floricultural world and comprehensively deal with the achievements made in the researches into their biological peculiarities, breeding and cultivation and their dissemination and others. 
					
					 "Complete Book on Kimilsungia" carries on its first page a photograph of President Kim Il Sung receiving newly-bred Kimilsungia from former Indonesian President Sukarno. The book has five parts, 14 chapters and 46 sections. 
					
					 The first part of the book says that Kimilsungia is the precious fruition of the progressives' profound reverence for Kim Il Sung and it is in full bloom all over the world with their genuine and warm feelings as nutrition. 
					
					 Its second part is devoted to scientific contents including Kimilsungia's position in taxonomy, its shape, histology, growth, photosynthetic peculiarity and requirement for light and temperature and nutritious physiological characteristics.
					
					 Its third part systematically deals with the successes and experience gained in the breeding and cultivation of Kimilsungia for more than four decades after its appearance. 
					
					 Its fourth part tells about how the immortal flower is disseminated worldwide and how grandly immortal flower festivals have been held.
					
					 The fifth part of the book is devoted to carrying some of the works created by servicepersons and people in praise of the flower symbolic of the greatness of the President. 
					
					 "Complete Book on Kimjongilia" carries on its first page a picture of Kim Il Sung seeing Kimjongilia, the immortal flower. The book has five parts, 15 chapters and 51 sections. 
					
					 Its first part tells story about Japanese horticulturist Mototeru Kamo who bred Kimjongilia, attracted by the greatness of General Secretary Kim Jong Il, and edits a letter sent by the former to the latter. 
					
					 Its second part deals with the flower's position in plant taxonomy and the course of its breeding, its shape and histology, peculiarities of its growth, nutritious physiological and ecological characteristics. 
					
					 Its third part comprehensively deals with the achievements and experience gained in the work to put the flower's breeding and cultivation on a scientific basis.  
					
					 The fourth part of the book is devoted to photo-accompanied information about the flower including centers for disseminating Kimjongilia in different parts of the country, the successes made in the researches into the flower and Kimjongilia festivals and shows and others.   
					
					 The fifth part of the book introduces some of the works written in praise of Kim Jong Il, representing all servicepersons and people's boundless reverence for the great man.

articles.title: Source of DPRK's Invincibility
articles.content:
Source of DPRK's Invincibility
Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), which regards to protect the interests of the working masses as the supreme principle in its activities, has all along defended their interests and struggled for their happiness.
					This is based on the fighting purpose and mission of the WPK for defending the independence of the people and accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					The supreme principle is an important guarantee which enables the Party to deepen its relations with the masses and consolidate the mass foundation of the revolution.
					
					The WPK has constantly strengthened its leading position, enjoying the absolute support and trust of the popular masses. It is because the Party has exerted all its efforts for the popular masses, regarding them as the root for its existence and the source of inexhaustible might.
					
					Thus the Korean people are entrusting their destinies entirely to the great revolutionary party and are implementing the Party's lines and policies by displaying boundless loyalty and devotion with the revolutionary faith "As the Party decides, so we do!"
					
					The Party defends firmly the interests of the people and the latter responds to the former's leadership with fidelity. Herein lie the source of the man-centered socialist Korea's invincibility and the decisive guarantee for all victories.
					
					The WPK will, in the future, too, cement its close relations with the popular masses in the efforts to carry the Songun revolutionary leadership of  Kim Jong Il into reality, thus demonstrating the might as an invincible revolutionary party.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Foiling Imperialists' Strategy to Monopolize Natural Resources
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Foiling Imperialists' Strategy to Monopolize Natural Resources
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- The imperialists are becoming all the more vicious in their moves to plunder and monopolize natural resources of other countries under various pretexts, says Rodong Sinmun today in a signed article.
					 It is an important task facing humankind at present to resolutely shatter the strategy of the imperialists to monopolize natural resources, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 Today the imperialists leave no means untried to monopolize major natural resources of the world.
					
					Imperialist big powers regard it as their state policy to perpetrate any act to ensure economic concessions of big monopoly capital and monopolize many more natural resources of the world. This is their way of thinking and logic.
					
					 The moves of the imperialists to monopolize natural resources at present are characterized by the fact that they are seeking to put major areas of natural resources under their control through reorganization and relocation of armed forces.
					
					 The imperialists are channeling main efforts into reorganizing and relocating armed forces in Central Asia and Mideast countries.
					
					 Imperialist big powers are now coveting Mideast and Central Asia, the major areas of oil resources, and embroiled in scrambles to seize them.
					
					 What is noteworthy in the moves of the U.S. imperialists to build new military bases is the forward-deployment of their armed forces to put major transport routes of natural resources and strategic vantages under their control.
					
					 What merits attention in the above-said moves is that they are keen on mainly putting oil or uranium resources under their control.
					
					 Another characteristic feature of their moves to monopolize natural resources at present is to secure natural resources through war.
					
					 They are now facing various knotty problems. One of them is a crisis of natural resources and oil.
					
					 A bigger problem of the U.S. is that its monopoly on oil is sinking. 
					
					 It is the basic trend of the world politics to head for multi-polarization at present after the Cold War demised.
					
					 To protect natural resources precisely means an anti-imperialist struggle. Only through an intensified anti-imperialist struggle, is it possible to protect natural resources, develop economy and defend the sovereignty of the countries and the nations.
					
					The natural resources of the world should be developed and used in favor of the common development of humankind according to the new fair international economic order. Developing countries should boost the South-South cooperation in the field of development of natural resources.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Racket of Confrontation with DPRK Slammed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Racket of Confrontation with DPRK Slammed 
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- The DPRK will neither remain a passive onlooker to the anti-DPRK racket of the Lee Myung Bak group nor pardon those who dare hurt the inviolable system in the DPRK, the dignity and life and soul of its people, but mete out a decisive and merciless punishment to them, warns a commentator of Rodong Sinmun today in his article. 
					 The Lee group is becoming more frantic in its racket of confrontation with the DPRK in league with outside forces, instead of dropping its anti-reunification "policy towards the north," thus blatantly challenging the desire of the times and the nation, the article says, and goes on:
					
					All the dialogues between the authorities of the north and the south were stopped and the inter-Korean relations have been driven to a touch-and-go situation, going beyond the phase of freeze and deterioration, due to the reckless anti-DPRK confrontational moves of the Lee group.
					
					 The history of the south Korean puppet regimes knows no other than the Lee group of traitors who have been so hell-bent on sycophancy towards the U.S. and confrontation with fellow countrymen. 
					
					 The real aim sought by the Lee group in escalating such moves for confrontation with the DPRK is to divert elsewhere the public criticism of it touched off by its sycophantic and treacherous policy and unpopular misrule and get rid of its crisis, first of all. 
					
					The unprecedented anti-DPRK confrontational moves of the Lee group are the revelation of their sinister intention to tide over the crisis in which they are forsaken by everybody for pursuing confrontation with the DPRK and, furthermore, realize their daydream, pursuant to the U.S. policy to stifle it. 
					
					 Another aim sought by the group of traitors is to stem the trend of the times towards independent reunification and bring back the inter-Korean relations to those in the era of the Cold War.
					
					 In fact, the negation of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration means denying the ideology and system in the DPRK and seeking confrontation between the north and the south.
					
					 Now it has become clearer that the south Korean conservative regime has nothing but the idea of standing in confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 It is quite ridiculous for the Lee group to dare stand in confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 It is a blatant challenge to the system in the DPRK and an open declaration of a war for the group to dare hurt its supreme dignity.
					
					 The DPRK sets store by the north-south relations, but it will decisively counter confrontation with confrontation and a war with a war if someone provokes it. 
					
					If such confrontation and war break out, the DPRK will achieve reunification and have nothing to lose except the Military Demarcation Line.
					
					 The moves for an anti-north war stepped up by the south Korean puppets in league with the U.S. to cope with "contingency" would not only bring a nuclear disaster to the Korean nation but create such a dangerous situation as causing serious calamities to the surrounding areas.
					
					 Lee Myung Bak had better come to his senses and bear in mind that he will have no option but to follow in the deplorable footsteps of the preceding dictators who met disgraceful ends if he goes reckless as a puppet of the U.S. and ultra-right conservatives as now.
					
					If the group of traitors keeps to the road of reckless confrontation with the DPRK, defaming its dignity despite its repeated warnings, this will compel it to make a crucial decision including the total freeze of the north-south relations.
					
					 The DPRK will settle accounts to the last with those keen to realize their daydream.

articles.title: "World Food Day" Marked
articles.content:
"World Food Day" Marked
Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- It is quite possible to settle the problem of food if all countries of the world buckle down to the work for its solution with a will and make concerted efforts to this end, says Rodong Sinmun Thursday in an article dedicated to the "World Food Day" and the anniversary of the founding of the Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations (FAO). 
					The "World Food Day" instituted by the FAO is aimed at helping all the countries and all the people of the world properly understand the importance of the food problem and deepening the international discussion on the way of settling the worldwide food problem, the article notes, and goes on: 
					
					 The theme of "the World Food Day" this year is "World Food Security: the Challenge of Climatic Change and Bio-energy."
					
					A climatic change caused by the global warming and massive production of bio-fuel by use of grain are the factors of upsetting the world food security and causing food crisis which cannot be ignored. 
					
					 The world food situation still remains tense, posing a grave threat to mankind. 
					
					Having drawn a lesson from the present food crisis, a lot of countries are developing agriculture by their own efforts and striving to increase the grain production to solve the food problem.  
					
					 The DPRK has waged energetic drive to boost the agricultural production despite natural calamities that hit it for several consecutive years.  It has taken a series of realistic and effective measures to do so. It laid down the policies for bringing about radical turns in seed improvement and potato farming and double-cropping and has pushed ahead with gigantic nature-remaking projects including the land realignment and waterway construction in a planned manner. It, at the same time, strictly applied the principle of a right crop in the right soil and a right crop in the right time in the agricultural production and actively developed and introduced advanced farming technique and methods. This is making the prospect of settling the food problem bright in the DPRK.
					
					 A solution to the worldwide food problem is by no means impossible.

articles.title: Unity for Independent Reunification, Peace and Prosperity Called for
articles.content:
Unity for Independent Reunification, Peace and Prosperity Called for
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- The emergency measure committee for frustrating the retaliatory crackdown upon participants in candlelight actions, moves for scrapping the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and a plot to fake up a case for suppressing the Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration in south Korea on Oct. 10 issued an appeal to the compatriots at home and abroad.
					 The appeal said that Lee Myung Bak is becoming evermore desperate in his moves to totally negate the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and the anti-reunification acts and confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					
					 The appeal condemned the Lee dictatorial regime for intensifying than ever before the suppression of the progressive forces aspiring after independent reunification under the pretext of "security", crying out for "reexamining the October 4 declaration" and letting loose such confrontational outbursts without hesitation as "there would be no advance without eliminating pro-north leftist forces".
					
					 The Lee group should no longer be allowed to persist in its anti-reunification acts, the appeal said, urging all the pro-reunification and patriotic forces to carry on the struggle to support and implement the above-said declarations by the concerted efforts of the Koreans.
					
					 It called on all Koreans in the south and the north and overseas and reunification movement forces on this land to make a more dynamic advance for reunification despite any difficulties and trials, more firmly upholding the said declarations and unite closer for independent reunification, peace and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Resignation of Puppet Minister of National Defence of S. Korea Urged
articles.content:
Resignation of Puppet Minister of National Defence of S. Korea Urged
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- The Democratic Labor Party, the People for Achieving Peace and Reunification, the Solidarity for Progress of south Korea and other political parties, civic and public organizations held a press conference in Seoul on Oct. 10 condemning the puppet minister of National Defence for his sycophancy towards the United States. 
					 At the press conference speakers blasted the minister for having justified the diversion of the funds for the upkeep of the U.S. forces in south Korea to the purpose of the transfer of their bases.
					
					 Accusing the Lee Myung Bak "government" of getting tight-lipped about the wrongdoings perpetrated by the U.S., while telling the people to abide by the "law" and "principle," they urged the above-said minister to step down at once as he is utterly indifferent to the people to meet the U.S. demands.
					
					 A press release read out at the press conference said that it is quite unreasonable for him to shut eyes to the U.S. wrongdoings without any legal ground or procedure.
					
					  If the assertion of the minister of defence is justified, a special agreement on sharing the expenses for the upkeep of the U.S. forces will be a channel for providing funds for the transfer of the U.S. military bases, it charged. 
					
					 It held that the minister of defence has no qualification as he takes the lead in bringing back the period of the past military dictatorship and meeting the interests of the U.S.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Russia
Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "Our Socialism Centred on the Masses Shall Not Perish" was brought out in pamphlet by the Party for Peace and Unity of Russia.
					The work, published on May 5, Juche 80 (1991), clarifies the sure victory of Korean-style socialism, key to the solidity and invincibility of socialism in the DPRK and its essential characteristics, etc.
					
					A book-releasing ceremony took place in Moscow on Oct. 9.

articles.title: Center for Study of Juche Idea Opens in Venezuela
articles.content:
Center for Study of Juche Idea Opens in Venezuela
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- An opening ceremony of the Center for the Study of the Juche Idea was held in a city, Lara State of Venezuela, on October 4 on the occasion of the 63rd founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					Omar Lopez, chairman of the Venezuelan National Society for the Study of the Juche Idea, declared the center open and speeches were made by personages at the ceremony.
					
					 The mayor of the city said that he deemed it honor to hold the opening ceremony of the above-said center on the occasion of the significant day of the Korean people. The reality today when the revolutionary forces in Latin-American countries are dynamically advancing along the road of independence against the U.S after coming to power one after another clearly proves the justice of the Juche idea once again, he stressed. 
					
					 The director for Social Development of the city office said that while studying works of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il and history of Korea he came to know well about the Juche idea and the heroic struggle of the Korean people.
					
					 To deeply study the experience of the DPRK and the Juche idea is of weighty importance for the Latin-American countries in finding the way of advancing revolution, overcoming hardships, he noted, reiterating his resolution to make a positive contribution to the Venezuelan revolution by deeply studying the Juche idea and widely disseminating it among the people. 
					
					 The DPRK ambassador to Venezuela was present there on invitation.

articles.title: Birthday of WPK Observed in Great Britain
articles.content:
Birthday of WPK Observed in Great Britain
Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- Harpal Brar, chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Great Britain (Marxist-Leninist), issued a statement on October 10 on the occasion of the 63rd anniversary of the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The statement noted that under the wise guidance of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il the WPK has successfully led the Korean people in their struggle to defend the independence of the country and build a powerful socialist state for the past more than six decades despite the moves of the U.S. imperialists and all hues of enemies.
					
					 The WPK's disinterested cooperation and solidarity with the anti-imperialist national liberation struggle and the building of new society of the world progressive people in several regions including Asia, Africa and Latin America serve as the brilliant example of internationalism, it said, and went on:
					
					 The Communist Party of Great Britain sets great store by the fraternal relations with the WPK.
					
					 We will always stand by the Korean people in their struggle to oppose the U.S. imperialists and other reactionary forces and defend the sovereignty of the country and build a great prosperous powerful socialist nation on the land of Korea.
					
					 We will strive to give wide publicity to the WPK and the Korean people under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il among the British working class and the progressive people and actively support and encourage their struggle.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised by Mexican Figure
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised by Mexican Figure
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- Reginaldo Sandobal, coordinator of the National Coordinating Committee of the Workers' Party of Mexico who visited the DPRK, expressed his profound reverence for President Kim Il Sung. He said as follows:
					 The President is a great man, indeed.
					
					Visiting various places of the DPRK we came to know better about the immortal exploits the President performed in founding the Workers' Party of Korea and strengthening and developing it.
					
					 No one in the world is as great as the President who devoted his whole life to the prosperity of the country and the happiness of the people.
					
					 The Korean people won a brilliant victory in the Fatherland Liberation War against the armed invasion of the imperialist allied forces under his leadership.
					
					 In the subsequent period they worked miracles to be specially recorded in human history.
					
					 The President made undying contributions to the world peace and the cause of global independence.
					
					 He is the most prominent great man recognized by the world.
					
					 General Secretary Kim Jong Il who is successfully carrying forward the idea and cause of the President has firmly defended the sovereignty of the country and the dignity of the nation with his Songun politics.
					
					 Only victory and glory will always be in store for the WPK and the Korean people dynamically advancing true to the leadership of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Delegado coreano exterioriza criterio sobre la lucha antiterrorista
articles.content:
Delegado coreano exterioriza criterio sobre la lucha antiterrorista 
Pyongyang, 16 de octubre (ATCC) -- Durante el debate sobre "Las medidas para la eliminacion del terrorismo internacional", agenda de la reunion de la 6a Comision del 63o periodo de sesiones de la Asamblea General de la ONU, efectuada el dia 8, el delegado coreano expuso el criterio de la delegacion sobre la lucha antiterrorista. 
					Hay que prestar la atencion especial a eliminar sin demora los actos terroristas estatales, dijo y continuo:
					
					Las invasiones de las tropas estadounidenses contra Afganistan e Iraq y la "guerra antiterrorista" que sigue en estos dos paises devienen el prototipo del terrorismo segun el ejercito estatal. 
					
					La sociedad internacional debe elevar la conciencia sobre la peligrosidad de los actos terroristas por el ejercito estatal y debe esforzarse por hacer que todas las actividades antiterroristas se realicen tomando por eje la ONU conforme al proposito y el principio de la Carta de la ONU y en el rumbo de respetar la ley internacional. 
					
					Ademas, en cualquier caso no deben ser tolerados que algunos paises determinados abusen de la lucha antiterrorista como una palanca para adquirir sus fines politicos y economicos.
					
					Para eliminar el origen del terrorismo, es necesario establecer las justas e imparciales relaciones internacionales de respeto mutuo, igualdad, amistad y cooperacion para que todos los paises y naciones ejerzan por completo sus derechos a vivir y desarrollar de manera independiente y, a la vez, prestar la fuerza primordial a acabar con la desigualdad social y las miserias. 
					
					Fiel al ideal de politica exterior de la independencia, la paz y la amistad, el gobierno de la RPDC mantiene invariablemente la posicion de oponerse resueltamente a los actos terroristas de toda indole y todas las formas de apoyo al terrorismo.
					
					En el futuro tambien cumplira con su responsabilidad y deber como pais miembro de la ONU para acabar con el origen del terrorismo de toda forma y construir un mundo pacifico, estable y prospero.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam recibe cartas credenciales de embajador nepales
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam recibe cartas credenciales de embajador nepales
Pyongyang, 16 de octubre (ATCC) --  Tanka Prasad Karki presento este jueves en el Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae ante el presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, sus cartas credenciales que le acreditan como nuevo embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de Nepal en Corea.
					Tras recibirlas, Kim Yong Nam departio con el diplomatico.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena campana conflictiva de Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena campana conflictiva de Lee Myung Bak
Pyongyang, 16 de octubre (ATCC) -- No estaremos jamas con brazos cruzados ante los complots de la banda de Lee Myung Bak contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y castigaremos de manera tajante y despiadada a los tipejos, que se atrevan a atentar nuestro sagrado regimen dignidad y vida de nuestro pueblo, sin perdonarlos ni en lo minimo.
					Advierte el periodico Rodong Sinmun en el articulo de un comentarista publicado en su edicion del dia 16 y continua:
					
					En vez de abandonar la "politica al Norte" de caracter anti-reunificacion, la banda de Lee desafio frontalmente a la aspiracion de la epoca y la nacion dando mas calor a los alborotos de enfrentamiento con la RPDC en contubernio con las fuerzas foraneas.
					
					Debido a estas imprudentes maniobras, fueron suspendidos todos los dialogos entre las autoridades del Norte y el Sur de Corea y las relaciones bilaterales estan llegando a la situacion a punto de explosion tras sobrepasar las etapas de congelacion y empeoramiento.
					
					En la historia de los anteriores regimenes titeres del Sur de Corea no hubo otra pandilla de traidores tan enloquecida como la banda de Lee por el servilismo a Estados Unidos y la confrontacion fratricida.
					
					Las maniobras de esta horda por el enfrentamiento con la RPDC parten sobre todo de su intencion de salir de la crisis al desviar las criticas de la opinion publica generadas por su politica vendepatria y servil a grandes potencias y las infames politicas antipopulares.
					
					Tal inaudita campana conflictiva con la RPDC deviene la expresion de la siniestra intencion de la banda de Lee de salvarse del callejon sin salida mediante el enfrentamiento con ella y realizar su necia ambicion adhiriendose a la politica de EE.UU. para aplastarla.
					
					Ademas, tiene por su objetivo bloquear la corriente de la epoca actual hacia la reunificacion independiente y hacer regresar al periodo de la guerra fria las relaciones Norte-Sur.
					
					Al decir la verdad, la negacion a la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y a la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre no es otra cosa que rehusar la idea y el regimen de la contraparte y buscar el enfrentamiento.
					
					Ahora se hace mas claro que el "poder" conservador surcoreano piensa unicamente en enfrentarse con la RPDC, lo que seria una locura tan ridicula.
					
					El atentado a nuestra maxima dignidad por parte de la horda de Lee deviene el desafio frontal a nuestro sistema y abierta declaracion de guerra.
					
					Si bien apreciamos mucho las relaciones con el Sur, responderemos rotundamente a los provocadores con el enfrentamiento a la confrontacion y con la guerra a la guerra.
					
					Lo que alcanzaremos en este enfrentamiento y guerra es la reunificacion y lo que perderemos es la Linea de Demarcacion Militar.
					
					Las maniobras belicas para la agresion al Norte, que libran los titeres surcoreanos en contubernio con EE.UU. para hacer frente a la supuesta "situacion emergente", infligiran desastre nuclear a la nacion coreana y crearan una situacion tan peligrosa que impondra calamidades tambien a las regiones perifericas.
					
					Lee Myung Bak debe volver en si y darse cuenta de que si sigue actuado atrevida e imprudentemente como titere de EE.UU. y los elementos conservadores ultraderechistas, repetira el tragico y vergonzoso fin de los dictadores antecesores.
					
					Si esa banda de los traidores sigue desacreditando nuestra dignidad y tomando el camino del imprudente enfrentamiento con la RPDC desoyendo nuestras reiteradas advertencias, nos veremos obligados a tomar unas decisiones importantes incluyendo la ruptura total de las relaciones Norte-Sur. 
					
					Saldaremos la cuenta hasta el final con quienes persiguen su absurda ilusion.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia estrategia de monopolio de los imperialistas
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia estrategia de monopolio de los imperialistas
Pyongyang, 16 de octubre (ATCC) -- Los imperialistas maniobran siniestramente para expoliar y monopolizar los recursos naturales de otros paises valiendose de varios pretextos.
					Frustrar tal intento de los imperialistas es una de las tareas importantes que se presentan ante la humanidad en la actualidad.
					
					Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual del dia 16 y continua:
					
					Los imperialistas se valen de todos los medios y metodos para dominar de modo monopolista los principales recursos naturales del mundo.
					
					Las potencias imperialistas abrigan la teoria y el punto de vista de que si pueden asegurar la concesion economica del capital monopolista y monopolizar muchos recursos naturales del mundo, cualquier acto podra ser establecido como su politica estatal.
					
					En la actualidad, lo caracteristico en las maniobras de monopolio de recursos naturales de los imperialistas es controlar las principales zonas de recursos naturales mediante la reorganizacion y reubicacion de sus fuerzas armadas.
					
					Los imperialistas prestan la principal fuerza a la reorganizacion y reubicacion de sus fuerzas armadas en los paises de Asia Central y el Medio Oriente.
					
					Las potencias imperialistas dirigen su vista codiciosa al Medio Oriente y Asia Central que son zonas principales de recursos de petroleo crudo y libran la fiera contienda.
					
					Lo que llama atencion en las maniobras de los imperialistas norteamericanos para construir nueva base militar es emplazar primero sus fuerzas armadas  con el fin de apoderarse de las vias de transporte de recursos importantes y controlar los puntos estrategicos. Particularmente pretenden controlar el petroleo crudo y recursos de uranio.
					
					En la epoca actual otra caracteristica de tales maniobras de monopolio es el aseguramiento de los recursos naturales mediante la guerra.
					
					Ahora, los imperialistas se enfrentan a varios problemas dificiles. Uno de ellos es la crisis de recursos naturales y de petroleo.
					
					El problema mas dificil para EE.UU. es que se va desmoronando su posicion monopolista de petroleo.
					
					Hoy en que se finalizo la Guerra Fria, la multipolarizacion es la tendencia principal de la politica del mundo.
					
					La defensa de los recursos naturales es precisamente la lucha antiimperialista. Solo la lucha antiimperialista posibilita defender los recursos naturales, desarrollar la economia y defender la soberania del pais y la nacion.
					
					Los recursos naturales del mundo deben ser explotados y utilizados  en  favor del desarrollo comun de la humanidad bajo el nuevo e imparcial orden economico internacional. Los paises en vias de desarrollo deben fortalecer mas la cooperacion Sur-Sur en el sector de explotacion de recursos naturales.
